pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Light Moisturiser Hydrating 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE KIND TO SKIN FACIAL MOISTURISER HYDRATING LIGHT 125 ML

Dry skin? Simple Kind to Skin Hydrating Light Moisturiser provides care whilst feeling light on the skin, keeping it refreshed, replenished and hydrated for up to 12 hours. If you're looking for a face cleanser that leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and perfectly hydrated, without clogging your pores, then look no further. This moisturiser's fast-absorbing formula provides instant lightweight hydration, while skin-loving ingredients such as pro-vitamin B5 & vitamin E help to maintain healthy skin. Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic (it doesn't clog pores), our light moisturiser has been dermatologically tested and approved and contains no artificial colours or perfumes and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin, making it the perfect choice for sensitive skin. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why this cleanser is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals anywhere in the world. Our face wash is also made with post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastic bottles that are 100% recyclable with their lids. Whether you're looking for a hydrating face cream, a light moisturiser or just a go-to product to use after cleansing, Simple Kind to Skin Hydrating Moisturiser is the perfect addition to your regime. Apply this product after cleansing and toning your face, so your skin is clean and free from dirt, make-up and impurities. You'll soon see how it's absorbed by the skin and starts to replenish and hydrate. How to apply: Step 1: Apply a hazelnut-sized portion of the product into your hands. Step 2: Smooth gently into your face and neck using upward and outward movements. Use alongside Simple Kind to Skin Cleansing Water.

Boxed Contents: 125mL

Size: 125mL

KEY FEATURES

• Simple Kind to Skin Hydrating Light moisturiser is made with a lightweight and fast-absorbing formulation, to keep your skin feeling soft, smooth and perfectly hydrated for up to 12 hours
• Did you notice that this bottle of face moisturiser is a little darker than usual? It's because it's made from recycled plastic!
• Our face moisturiser is made with skin-loving ingredients such as pro-vitamin B5 and vitamin E and contains no artificial perfumes, colours or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin
• Dermatologically tested and approved, this hydrating moisturiser is perfect for sensitive skin, as it is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic (it doesn't clog pores)
• Hydrating Light Moisturiser contains no artificial perfumes or colours, no alcohol and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin and is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive skin
• Kind to Skin Light Moisturiser is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals anywhere in the world

Warnings

Australian Dollar

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Cetyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Pantolactone, Bisabolol, Sodium lactate, Lactic acid, Serine, Urea, Sorbitol, Allantoin, Sodium chloride, Potassium hydroxide, Carbomer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1,3-Diol, Mica, Titanium dioxide

Active Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Cetyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Pantolactone, Bisabolol, Sodium lactate, Lactic acid, Serine, Urea, Sorbitol, Allantoin, Sodium chloride, Potassium hydroxide, Carbomer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1,3-Diol, Mica, Titanium dioxide

Directions

Recyclable Packaging?: No
